name: Oijazz
description: A project bootstrap for Eleventy sites. With pipelines for PostCSS, JavaScript, and serverless functions
author: Bj√∂rn Ganslandt

scripts.build: yarn resize-images && yarn resize-images-webp && cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=prod eleventy
scripts.resize-images: npx sharp-cli -i src/site/images/products/*.* -o src/site/images/products/resized/ -f jpg resize 300 0
scripts.resize-images-webp: npx sharp-cli -i src/site/images/products/*.* -o src/site/images/products/resized/ -f webp resize 300 0
